title: Swamp Girl! - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Romance   Shoujo
tags: Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Humanoid Protagonist   Magic   Male to Female   Nobles   Pragmatic Protagonist   Pretend Lovers   R-15   Schemes And Conspiracies   S*aves   Slow Romance   Special Abilities   Weak Protagonist
author: Gotou Juuzou   後藤十蔵
description:
A capable adventurer — becomes a young girl!?

Chris is a fine adventurer in his own right, but thanks to his own carelessness, he is forced into a life-or-death gamble.

He doesn’t even have the time to think ‘I survived!?’, before he realizes that his body has become female.

So begins the story of his — or rather, her — suffering.>
